# Koshamain's War

was an armed struggle between the Ainu and Wajin that took place on the Oshima Peninsula of southern Hokkaid≈ç, Japan, in 1457. Escalating out of a dispute over the purchase of a sword, Koshamain and his followers sacked , before being overcome by superior forces under Takeda Nobuhiro. The principal record of the conflict is Shinra no Kiroku.
